user.title: Set up the GPSLogger Webhook
user.description: Are you sure you want to set up the GPSLogger Webhook?

create_entry.default:
To send events to Home Assistant, you will need to set up the webhook feature in GPSLogger.

Fill in the following info:

- URL: `{webhook_url}`
- Method: POST

See [the documentation]({docs_url}) for further details.
